title: A Survey about interviewing process in BCA Probolinggo
abstract: The interview process is a critical part of the recruitment process; an interview needs some techniques that the interviewer should learn because a good interviewer supports the interview process's success. This paper is about interview techniques used in BCA Probolinggo, which discuss their way of interviewing the right employee for a particular position. To know how BCA does the interview, the writer sees from several points related to the interview process in BCA, they are : - The definition of interview - Purpose of the interview - Techniques of interview - The materials asked in an interview - The factors that influence the interview process Considering that the applicant's acceptance depends on the result of the interview and test, the writer makes a comparison between the interview process in BCA Probolinggo toward its theory.
